name: The King's Lance
blurb: a cross platform mobile multiplayer game (iphone, android, windows) focusing on medieval tournament with a new take on a familiar tale.

rewards.reward: PAGE --\r\n1. Access to blog updates giving you a sneak peak into the universe of the Pauldron Games.\r\n2. A copy of the game (and one for a friend) for your chosen, relevant platform. (see funding chart)

SQUIRE --
in addition to previous gifts....

3. Code for exclusive in-game lance
4. Code for exclusive in-game shield

MAN AT ARMS --
in addition to previous gifts....
5. exclusive code for in-game armor, and your name in the credits.
6. pdf art book with all art pieces, some development notes and sneak peak into future content

KNIGHT -- 
in addition to previous gifts....
7. exclusive Kickstarter T-shirt
8. hardback 'storybook' special edition art book
 (add $15 for international shipping)

LORD --
in addition to previous gifts....
9. Get into the game! Your name added to a list for a random knight generator. 
10. large high quality landscape print of concept art used in game (you can frame it or mount it via adhesive back)
11. Kick-starter exclusive Kings Lance hoodie with stainless steel pendant (or keychain, zipperpull etc...) bearing the mark of the King's Guard.
 (add $25 for international shipping)

REGENT --
in addition to previous gifts....
12. Single color, paint-able resin desktop statue (which will double as an ipad stand.) of a main character in the game. 
13. Send us your families' coat of arms to use as an avatar icon in game! (some design considerations apply)
14. Huge, full bleed landscape concept art (with gator board and pegs ready to mount on wall)
 (add $30 for international shipping)

KING's GUARD --
in addition to previous gifts....
15. create a knight's armor! Send us a design to use in-game with a menu description (must follow certain design guidelines)
16. attend our launch party in Washington State! Enjoy great food, games, and a reading of the story by the voice-over talent.  (backers of this level are responsible for transportation and lodging) Details will follow soon...
17. receive an exclusive custom made "Lost Sword" sword replica (1:1 scale decorative piece, not a battle ready weapon)
18. Become a character in the game! You (or an avatar character) will become immortalized in some concept art (image showing several knights) as one of the few knights in the King's Guard!

KING --
In addition to previous gifts...
19. become integrated in the universe as a key character! We'll take your photo and we will put you in the game, or work with the creator directly to develop an avatar character.
20. One on one experience with the creators of the game! Enjoy a fancy meal, discuss future game play and story elements to get a sneak peak into the future of Pauldron Games!
21. Lifetime supply of Pauldron Games digital content, along with a big hug!
